summary: Adds lorecraft books for new dawnguard items.
descriptionHtml:
Requirements:
Lorecraft: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9959
Dawnguard


I have added new Lorecraft books in order to cover new items added by Danwguard. I tested this pretty thoroughly, so there shouldnt be any leftover items that show up even with this installed. Note that I did add Lorecraft book requirement for Dawnguard\'s crossbows, but I did not place them anywhere in the world (they are random drops) and they still have vanilla requirements as well.

Instalation instructions:
Use NMM and make sure that this plugin is loaded after core Lorecraft.
author: Taro
